description: Pearly Everlasting (Anaphalis margaritacea) is an amazing plant species due to its ability to survive in extreme conditions. It thrives in both dry, rocky soils and humid climates. Its brilliant white flowers are an eye-catching addition to any garden, while its unique papery foliage provides a stunning contrast. Its hardiness and drought-tolerance also make it great for drought-prone areas and xeriscaping. Its blooms range in color from a delicate white to a rich deep yellow, and the plant can continually bloom and produce new flowers throughout the summer and fall months. Pearly Everlasting is a beautiful and resilient addition to any garden.
